thread.title: BRIEF-BofI Holding Announces Acquisition Of Trustee And Fiduciary Services Business From Epiq

title: BRIEF-BofI Holding Announces Acquisition Of Trustee And Fiduciary Services Business From Epiq

organizations.name: brief-bofi holding announces acquisition of trustee
brief-bofi holding announces acquisition of trustee and fiduciary services business from epiq

text:
April 4, 2018 / 8:36 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-BofI Holding Announces Acquisition Of Trustee And Fiduciary Services Business From Epiq Reuters Staff 
April 4 (Reuters) - BofI Holding Inc: 
* BOFI HOLDING, INC. ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF TRUSTEE AND FIDUCIARY SERVICES BUSINESS FROM EPIQ 
* EXPECTS ACQUISITION TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS. 
* ALL-CASH TRANSACTION WAS FUNDED FROM EXISTING CAPITAL AT BOFI FEDERAL BANK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
